trans-unit.source: Defines an interface for common formatting-option properties to be applied to field template user controls.

Gets a value that indicates whether the formatting string that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions.DataFormatString*> property is applied to field values when the field is in edit mode.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the formatting string is applied in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> values when the data field is updated in the data source.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if empty string values are automatically converted to null values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
Gets a value that indicates whether the data for the control is HTML-encoded before it is rendered.
HTML-encoding field values helps prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being rendered to the browser.
This property should be enabled unless you trust the content or have checked for malicious content in another way.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data for the control is HTML-encoded before it is rendered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the caption that is displayed for a field when the field value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The caption that is displayed for a field when the field value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
